original_text: And many people came together in Jerusalem to keep the Feast of Unleavened Bread in the second month, a very great assembly.
korean_text: 둘째 달에 백성이 무교절을 지키려 하여 예루살렘에 많이 모이니 매우 큰 모임이라

sentences.original_text: And many people came together in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 많은 사람들이 예루살렘에 함께 모였으니

sentences.original_text: to keep the Feast of Unleavened Bread
